channel.title: MAX XP? *Willing to give Free Rep.. offer wont last long
channel.description:
YOU KNOW HOW LIKE WHEN YOU TRAIN AND U GET TO 135 AND IT SAYS MAX XP REACHED.. HOW CAN U MAKE IT TO WHERE THE MAX LVL IS 200 INSTEAD OF 135??
p.s. is it dealing WITH THE CLIENT?
THANKS SO MUCH!

item.description:
@fr3sh_aka_clutch wrote:

on my server? is 135 max lvl but i want 200… i found out how to change it but i need to know whats the max xp for lvl 200…

if ((amount + playerXP[skill]) < 0 || playerXP[skill] > 2000000000) { sendMessage("Max XP value reached"); return false; }
